name: Vitamin C Serum
shortDescription: Gentle cleanser with aloe vera for all skin types
longDescription: Our Aloe Vera Face Wash is formulated with pure aloe vera extract and other natural ingredients to gently cleanse your skin without stripping its natural oils. Suitable for all skin types, it helps maintain skin's pH balance while providing hydration and a refreshing feel.
ingredients: Aloe Vera Extract, Coconut Oil, Tea Tree Oil, Vitamin E, Natural Glycerin
usage: Wet your face with water. Take a small amount of face wash and massage gently in circular motions. Rinse thoroughly with water. Use twice daily for best results.

name: Vitamin B5 Serum
shortDescription: Promotes hair growth and reduces hair fall
longDescription: Our Hair Growth Oil is a powerful blend of 12 natural oils that nourish the scalp, strengthen hair roots, and promote healthy hair growth. Regular use reduces hair fall and improves hair texture.
ingredients: Bhringraj Oil, Coconut Oil, Almond Oil, Amla Extract, Rosemary Oil, Peppermint Oil
usage: Apply oil to scalp and massage gently for 5-10 minutes. Leave for at least 2 hours or overnight. Wash with mild shampoo. Use 2-3 times a week.

name: Niacinamide Serum
longDescription: Our rich Body Butter provides intense hydration for dry skin. The luxurious formula absorbs quickly without greasy residue, leaving skin soft and supple all day.
ingredients: Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E
usage: Apply to damp skin after shower for better absorption. Massage in circular motions until fully absorbed. Use daily for best results.

name: Salicylic Acid Serum
shortDescription: Brightens skin and reduces dark spots
longDescription: Our Vitamin C Serum is a potent antioxidant formula that brightens skin tone, reduces dark spots and pigmentation, and boosts collagen production for youthful, radiant skin.
ingredients: Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid), Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Ferulic Acid, Aloe Vera
usage: Apply 2-3 drops on cleansed face and neck after toner. Gently pat until absorbed. Follow with moisturizer. Use once daily, preferably in the morning.

name: Hyalourinc Serum
longDescription: Our rich Body Butter provides intense hydration for dry skin. The luxurious formula absorbs quickly without greasy residue, leaving skin soft and supple all day.
ingredients: Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E
usage: Apply to damp skin after shower for better absorption. Massage in circular motions until fully absorbed. Use daily for best results.

name: kojic Acid Serum
shortDescription: Broad spectrum protection with natural ingredients
longDescription: Our Natural Sunscreen provides broad spectrum SPF 50 protection against UVA and UVB rays without harmful chemicals. It's lightweight, non-greasy, and suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin.
ingredients: Zinc Oxide, Raspberry Seed Oil, Carrot Seed Oil, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter
usage: Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours or after swimming/sweating. Can be used as a daily moisturizer with SPF protection.

name: Glycolic Acid Serum
longDescription: Our Herbal Shampoo is free from harsh sulfates and parabens. It gently cleanses hair while maintaining natural oils, leaving hair soft, shiny and manageable.
ingredients: Shikakai, Reetha, Amla, Bhringraj, Aloe Vera, Hibiscus
usage: Wet hair thoroughly. Apply shampoo and massage into scalp. Rinse well. Follow with conditioner if needed. Use 2-3 times a week.
